value.li: All Orkoid lifeforms begin as a single type spore, these spores can grow into harmless fungus, or they can grow into any orkoid creature, from squigz to those orkz that become mighty warbosses"
Fungus spawn chances can be modified via the Mod Options menu.
Ork weapons and technology can only be produced/researched by Orkz.
Orkz all count as having the Bloodlust/Psychopath trait.
Orkoids are incredibly resilient, given enough time and nutrition they can regenerate from most non fatal wounds, even regrowing entire limbs.
Snotlings, when properly trained can perform most menial tasks(Cleaning, Hauling, Firefighting, Farming, Etc).
